title: Хутор
overview: Artyom, an information gypsy, is trying to escape justice and is hiding from persecution in a "farm." The closed community is led by a Father who has renounced technology and other benefits of civilization. Numerous followers of the leader live by his laws, but with the advent of Artyom, the usual order of things begins to change. Sergey Romanovich's first project after returning to the industry.
